product_name: Lost Horizons Kelsey Pullover Hat - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Stay warm while walking around town or cross-country skiing in the Lost Horizons Kelsey Pullover Hat. Features an all-wool shell and a multicolored, braided topknot. Microfleece lining wraps head in itch-free softness and warmth. Special buy.
short_description: Stay warm while walking around town or cross-country skiing in the Lost Horizons Kelsey Pullover Hat.
